title: Minister Gamini Lokuge’s driver beaten to death
body_lines: The driver of Energy Minister Gamini Lokuge has been beaten to death at his residence in Gamwanawatta, Mavittara in Kesbewa this evening, Police said.
They said a group of men had assaulted the driver following a personal dispute and he had died on admission to the Piliyandala Hospital.
Police launched investigations following information received to the police emergency hotline 119.
The victim was identified as a 41 year-old resident of Gamwanawatta, Mavittara in Piliyandala.
Police said the driver was hacked to death following an argument with a motorcyclist who was riding a motorcycle several times, making a loud noise in front of his house.
The Kesbewa Police are investigating to arrest the suspects.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
